_ALPHA_SESSION.description: Type here your QR code. Get it using >> https://replit.com/@AlphaXteam

SUDO.description: Sudo mode is gives other controler for your bot , Leave it blank if you'r not using it , Number must be Like 94XXXXXXX,0

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language - English => EN , Sinhala=> SI , Kannada => KN , Turkish => TR , Malayalam => ML , Russian => RU , Azerbaijian => AZ , Hindi => HI [ More Languages coming soon.. ]

CAPTION.description: Customizable CAPTION Message! Type a caption for bot medias.

COMMAND_EMOJI.description: Customizable COMMAND LIST EMOJI! Type a emoji for show with commands.

DESC_EMOJI.description: Customizable COMMAND LIST EMOJI! Type a emoji for show with discriptions.

WARN_EMOJI.description: Customizable COMMAND LIST EMOJI! Type a emoji for show with warnings.

COMMAND_LIST_KEY.description: Customizable COMMAND LIST KEY type a key to get all command list >> EX: alpha

ALIVE_MSG_KEY.description: Customizable ALIVE MSG KEY type a key to check if bot work >> EX: alive

BOT_NAME.description: Customizable BOT NAME! Type a Name for your bot.

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true for auto date to your bio, time in biography.

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 945xxxx && 94xxxx-1xxx or 91xxxx,94xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Alpha-X Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
